textcontext.title: Start with some highlights
textcontext.description: Explore the selection of unique music data we made for you. Each highlight represents a concept, a person, a place, a tune (and more!) that is somehow interconnected with others, to tell us a story. We update highlights on a regular basis, so that you never get bored. Scroll down and listen to our music box!

textcontext.title: Do you want to know more?
textcontext.description: Click on any highlight to unveil unexpected music connections! We selected some of the most insightful relations between people, places, genres, and more. Wouldnâ€™t mind a different genre? You can change the subject and start new research.
